comments:
Invalid error message ("The console buffer size must be at least 1000
characters.") in Run/Debug|Console when trying to set console buffer size larger
than 2147483647 (no, I don't want 2GB console, just testing :) ).

I don't know if it's related, but after these experiments when set console log
size to 400000 I got this error:

Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".

3.1M2 Linux/GTK
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 75177 ***
Oops, the exception is a dup, but the original problem is different.

Fixed in ConsolePreferencePage and DebugPreferencesMessages.
Set the max console width to 1000 characters and buffer size to 1000000 characters (1000 full lines at 
the maximum width). Changed the error messages to reflect the new allowable ranges.

using MAX_INT seems unreasonable as a buffer width or buffer size. The user would likely get (slightly) 
better performance from the console by just turning off the preference altogether.
Verified. Modified NLS message for buffer size.

traces.message: High water mark must be greater than low water mark
